name: Juara 2
description: Recognized for developing SleepSense, an IoT device for real-time monitoring of Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA), integrating ECG, respiratory patterns, and pulse oximetry.
details: This award was given for outstanding innovation in healthcare IoT. The SleepSense project involved designing an ergonomic belt-thorax sensor and pulse oximeter, with data processed via a web platform for clinical analysis.
image: images/achievement/Aldy Ardiansyah - Hackathon elevAIte Hub Universitas Gadjah Mada 2025.jpg
impact: Enabled affordable at-home OSA monitoring for improved healthcare access

name: Juara 2
description: Recognized for developing MotoRescue, an IoT and AI-powered road line detection system to enhance road safety and navigation.
details: Awarded for creating MotoRescue, an IoT device integrated with a computer vision system using OpenCV and deployed on Streamlit, capable of detecting road lane markings in real-time from images and videos, demonstrating innovation in road safety applications.
image: images/achievement/Sertifikat Juara 2 Kategori Mahasiswa - Samsung Innovation Campus Batch 5 (2023-2024).jpg
impact: Enhanced road safety through real-time lane detection technology

name: People Choice Award
description: Received for developing MotoRescue, an IoT and AI-powered road line detection system, recognized for its user-friendly deployment and practical impact.
details: MotoRescue was celebrated for its innovative integration of IoT and computer vision using OpenCV and Streamlit, providing an accessible and effective solution for real-time road lane detection, earning high praise from peers and judges.
image: images/achievement/Sertifikat Juara PCA Kategori Mahasiswa - Samsung Innovation Campus Batch 5 (2023-2024).jpg
impact: Promoted accessible IoT and AI solutions for road safety

name: Finalist ProtoTech Contest 2.0
description: Recognized as a finalist for developing SleepSense, an IoT device for real-time monitoring of Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA), integrating ECG, respiratory patterns, and pulse oximetry.
details: The SleepSense project was selected as a finalist for its innovative approach to affordable healthcare IoT, featuring an ergonomic sensor design and web-based clinical analysis, though it did not secure a top position.
impact: Showcased potential for scalable OSA monitoring solutions

name: Juara 1
organization: Kontes Robot Terbang Indonesia 2024 (Divisi Technology Development)
description: Contributed as a Technology Development team member by developing a Ground Control Station (GCS) for an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) focused on national self-reliance and sustainable progress.
details: As part of the Technology Development sub-team for Ground Control Station (GCS), I contributed to research about computer vision to mapping aerial object.
impact: Advanced UAV Ground Control Station technology for sustainable national development

name: Global Top 100 GDSC Solution Challenge 2024
description: Recognized for developing BIN-GO!, a mobile app for waste management in Yogyakarta, integrating Google Maps and gamification features.
details: The BIN-GO! app was selected among the top 100 solutions worldwide for its innovative approach to addressing environmental challenges through community engagement and alignment with impact on the SDGs.
impact: Contributed as an android developers to sustainable waste management practices in Yogyakarta
